hero.subtitle: TeamSync helps you streamline communication, track progress, and boost productivity for your distributed team. All in one beautiful platform.
features.title: Everything you need to manage your team
features.subtitle: Powerful tools designed to help your remote team collaborate effectively, stay organized, and achieve more together.
features.collaboration.title: Real-time Collaboration
features.collaboration.desc: Work together on documents and projects in real-time with your entire team.
features.tasks.title: Task Management
features.tasks.desc: Organize, prioritize, and track tasks with our intuitive Kanban boards and lists.
features.time.title: Time Tracking
features.time.desc: Monitor productivity and billable hours with automated time tracking features.
features.video.title: Video Conferencing
features.video.desc: HD video calls and screen sharing built directly into your workflow.
features.analytics.title: Advanced Analytics
features.analytics.desc: Gain insights into team performance with detailed reports and dashboards.
features.integrations.title: Seamless Integrations
features.integrations.desc: Connect with your favorite tools like Slack, GitHub, Jira, and more.
pricing.title: Simple, transparent pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that's right for your team. No hidden fees, cancel anytime.
pricing.starter.name: Starter
pricing.starter.desc: Perfect for small teams just getting started.
pricing.pro.name: Pro
pricing.pro.desc: Best for growing teams that need more power.
pricing.enterprise.name: Enterprise
pricing.enterprise.desc: For large organizations with custom needs.
faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about TeamSync. Can't find the answer you're looking for?
faq.q1: Is there a free trial available?
faq.a1: Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial for all paid plans. No credit card required to start.
faq.q2: Can I change my plan later?
faq.a2: Absolutely! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time from your account settings.
faq.q3: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.a3: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express) and PayPal.
faq.a4: Yes, we take security seriously. We use bank-level encryption and comply with GDPR and SOC 2 standards.
contact.title: Get in touch
contact.subtitle: Have a question or want to learn more? We'd love to hear from you.
contact.form.name: Name
contact.form.placeholder.name: John Doe
contact.form.success.desc: We'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.form.error.desc: Please try again or email us directly.
footer.desc: Empowering remote teams to collaborate effectively and achieve more together.
